mapper.sql: temp_id, temp_name, url, catalog, file_name, create_time, version,temp_type,upTemp_id
mapper.select: select temp_id, temp_name,create_time, version,temp_type from template
select temp_id, temp_name,create_time, version,temp_type from template where temp_type = 1;

select
from template t where t.upTemp_id = #{upTemp_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.insert: insert into template (temp_id, temp_name, url, catalog, file_name, create_time, version,temp_type,upTemp_id) values (#{temp_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temp_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{temp_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{upTemp_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into template
temp_id,
temp_name,
url,
catalog,
file_name,
create_time,
version,

mapper.update:
update template
temp_name = #{temp_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
catalog = #{catalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_name = #{file_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where temp_id = #{temp_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update template set temp_name = #{temp_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, catalog = #{catalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{file_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where temp_id = #{temp_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
